import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DynamicTitle(){const location=useLocation();const[pageMeta,setPageMeta]=useState({title:'Centro Partner - Psicopatici.com',description:'Welcome to Psicopatici, your trusted partner in website management and optimization.',keywords:'Psicopatici, Website Management, Digital Tools, Optimization',image:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/assets/images/home-image.png',url:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/'});useEffect(()=>{const fetchArticleMeta=async slug=>{try{const response=await fetch(`https://your-api-url.com/articles/${slug}`);const data=await response.json();setPageMeta({title:`${data.title} - Psicopatici.com`,description:data.description,keywords:data.keywords,image:data.image,url:`https://partner.psicopatici.com/article/${slug}`});}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching article meta:',error);}};const getPageMeta=pathname=>{switch(pathname){case'/':return{title:'Centro Partner - Psicopatici.com',description:'Welcome to Psicopatici, your trusted partner in website management and optimization.',keywords:'Psicopatici, Website Management, Digital Tools, Optimization',image:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/assets/images/home-image.png',url:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/'};case'/articles':return{title:'Articles - Psicopatici.com',description:'Explore our wide range of articles and resources on website management.',keywords:'Articles, Psicopatici, Resources, Website Management',image:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/assets/images/articles-image.png',url:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/articles'};default:if(pathname.startsWith('/article/')){const slug=pathname.split('/article/')[1];fetchArticleMeta(slug);return pageMeta;// Temporary until the data is fetched
}return{title:'404 - Page Not Found',description:'The page you are looking for does not exist.',keywords:'404, Page Not Found',image:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/assets/images/404-image.png',url:'https://partner.psicopatici.com/404'};}};const meta=getPageMeta(location.pathname);if(!location.pathname.startsWith('/article/')){setPageMeta(meta);}},[location.pathname]);const{title,description,keywords,image,url}=pageMeta;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"description",content:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"keywords",content:keywords}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"author",content:"Renatia"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"robots",content:"index, follow"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("link",{rel:"canonical",href:url}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:title",content:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:description",content:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:type",content:"website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:url",content:url}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:image",content:image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:site_name",content:"Psicopatici"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:card",content:"summary_large_image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:title",content:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:description",content:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:image",content:image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:site",content:"@Psicopatici"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"viewport",content:"width=device-width, initial-scale=1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{"http-equiv":"X-UA-Compatible",content:"IE=edge"})]});}export default DynamicTitle;
